title: am i the only one that got terrible your shop deals
body:
somehow got kayn and rengar skins but no ivern skin even though ive probably been playing ivern more than those 2 champs combined. i somehow also got guardian of the sands 2 times in a row
rito pls i was excited for today

replies.body:
Personally, I got a good mix. The least relevant was a Sona skin who I don't play much, but have a bit recently. All the others were for champs I play quite a lot. I only ended up buying one, mostly because I have skins I like better for the others, or don't already own those skins because I don't like them.

There are limitations on what skins you can get, but the FAQ goes into more detail on how skins are selected and such.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012568988-Your-Shop-FAQ
